Text:
GoodFilms, It´s me again the original audio it´s mixed with the russian audio  sorry to be dummy, but i try to find the 2nd audio track on media player classic and doesn´t appear only 1 track.

Sorry to bother you. :(
You can use mkvmerge GUI to remove the russian track and set the english to default. mkvmerge is part of the mkvtoolnix set of applications and is easy to use.

@Caiovsk 
You need to install latest "Haali Media Splitter" - google that. Then, you'll see it in MPC filters during playback and it'll allow you to manually switch mkv packed-inside audio & subs streams. Also in your tray.
